donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr:
The project supports outcomes of improved ICT infrastructure and electronic services that will increase government's interaction with citizens and businesses
The project will contribute in the following areas:
•	Public Administration effectiveness increased through deployment of e-services and system modernization
•	Improving the broadband penetration in Albania through the establishment of the national broadband network (NBN); 
•	Enhancement of the availability and use of government e-services.

project_descr: Supporting the Government of Albania to Improve ICT Infrastructure and e-Services in Albania
project_title: Supporting GoA to improve ICT infrastructure
